settings.title: Quantiles of age
settings.description: Please select a patient set and fill in two values for p.
settings.plotDescription: Here you can see a boxplot of the patient's ages:

input.name: p for lower quantile
input.description: Fill in a numeric value between 0.0 and 1.0, e.g. 0.05

input.name: p for upper quantile
input.description: Fill in a numeric value between 0.0 and 1.0, e.g. 0.95

output.name: Lower quantile
output.description: This is the lower quantile. It descripes the value where (p * number of patients) lies below this value.

output.name: Upper quantile
output.description: This is the upper quantile. It descripes the value where (p * number of patients) lies above this value.
